tool_description: Transforms ecliptic coordinates to equatorial coordinates using the obliquity of the ecliptic for the given date.

ecliptic_latitude.description: Ecliptic latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

julian_day.description: Julian Day Number to calculate obliquity

error_messages: Invalid ecliptic longitude: Must be between 0 and 360 degrees
Invalid ecliptic latitude: Must be between -90 and 90 degrees
Invalid Julian day: Must be a valid Julian Day Number
usage: Provide ecliptic coordinates and Julian day. Returns right ascension and declination in equatorial coordinate system.
